PageTitle: Collaborative document editing for Liferay | ONLYOFFICE Docs
PageDescription: Edit and collaborate on your documents from Liferay Document and Media Library
Subheader: Work on all kinds of office documents within Liferay using ONLYOFFICE Docs
WorkWithinConnector: Edit and co-author office documents within Liferay
DocumentsTab1Label: View and edit office files within the Documents and Media section.
DocumentsTab2Label: Create new text documents, spreadsheets, and presentations.
DocumentsTab3Label: Collaborate with multiple users on docs in real time and save the changes back to Liferay.
DocumentsTab4Label: Open, edit and collaborate on PDF files.
DocumentsTab5Label: Create fillable PDF forms and fill them out online.
FreeAppsHeading: Access and edit your documents stored in Liferay with <0>free desktop apps</0>
FreeAppsDesktopText: Edit and co-edit your Liferay files in the desktop environment with <0>ONLYOFFICE Desktop Editors</0> on Windows, Linux, or macOS
MarketplaceConnectorTitle: Designed for seamless integration with Liferay
MarketplaceConnectorDescription: Get the ONLYOFFICE app for Liferay now from the Liferay Marketplace.
Reason1: Support for more than <0>50 file formats</0>, fully compatible with MS Office formats: DOCX, XLSX, PPTX.
Reason2: A robust set of editing, formatting, and styling tools. Integrated <0>AI helper.</0>
Reason3: Real-time and paragraph-locking <0>co-editing</0>, review, version history, document comparison, comments & chat. Audio and video calls.
Reason4: <0>Enhanced security.</0> Flexible access rights and JWT. Watermarking and password protection. Open source code.
Reason5: <0>Easy integration and configuration</0>. Available in server and cloud versions.
Reason6: Cloud and self-hosted solution for total control over your data. Scalable Enterprise versions. <0>Free 30-day trial</0>.
HowToStartStep1: Deploy <0>ONLYOFFICE Docs</0> on your own server or create <1>Docs Cloud</1> account.
HowToStartStep2: Get the ONLYOFFICE connector from the <0>Liferay Marketplace</0>.
HowToStartStep3: Configure the connector and enable JWT.
ReadDetailedInstructions: Read detailed instructions in the <0>Help Center</0>.
NeedAnAppToConnect: Need an app to connect ONLYOFFICE to your favorite web service? Or have you developed one?
